turns.speaker: GILLIS
turns.text: How come?

turns.speaker: MAX
turns.text: The doctor suggested it.

turns.speaker: GILLIS
turns.text: What doctor?

turns.speaker: MAX
turns.text: Madame's doctor.  She has moments of melancholy.  There have been some suicide attempts.

turns.speaker: GILLIS
turns.text: Uh-huh?

turns.speaker: MAX
turns.text: We have to be very careful.  No sleeping pills, no razor blades. We shut off the gas in her bed- room.

turns.speaker: GILLIS
turns.text: Why?  Her career?  She got enough out of it.  She's not forgotten. She still gets those fan letters.

turns.speaker: MAX
turns.text: I wouldn't look too closely at the postmarks.

turns.speaker: GILLIS
turns.text: You send them.  Is that it, Max?

turns.speaker: MAX
turns.text: I'd better press your evening clothes, sir.  You have not for- gotten Madame's New Year's party.

turns.speaker: GILLIS
turns.text: No, I haven't.  I suppose all the waxworks are coming?

turns.speaker: MAX
turns.text: I don't know, sir.  Madame made the arrangements.

turns.speaker: GILLIS
turns.text: How is she?

turns.speaker: MAX
turns.text: She is upstairs.

turns.speaker: MAX
turns.text: Mr. Gillis, if you please.

turns.speaker: GILLIS
turns.text: Right with you.

turns.speaker: MAX
turns.text: You see those offices there, Mr. Gillis? They used to be her dressing room, The whole row.

turns.speaker: GILLIS
turns.text: That didn't leave much for Wallace Reid.

turns.speaker: MAX
turns.text: He had a great big bungalow on wheels.  I had the upstairs.  See where it says 'Readers' Department'? I remember my walls were covered with black patent leather...

turns.speaker: GILLIS
turns.text: What's the matter, Max?

turns.speaker: MAX
turns.text: I just found out why all those tele- phone calls.  It is not Miss Desmond they want.  It is the car they want to rent.

turns.speaker: GILLIS
turns.text: What?

turns.speaker: GILLIS
turns.text: What is it, Max? Want to wash the car, or are you doing a little spying in your off hours?

turns.speaker: MAX
turns.text: You must be very careful as you cross the patio.  Madame may be watching.

turns.speaker: GILLIS
turns.text: How about my going up the kitchen stairs and undressing in the dark. Will that do it?

turns.speaker: MAX
turns.text: I'm not inquiring where Mr. Gillis goes every night...

turns.speaker: GILLIS
turns.text: Why don't you? I'm writing a script and I'm dying to finish it, no matter what.

turns.speaker: MAX
turns.text: It's just that I'm very worried about Madame.

turns.speaker: GILLIS
turns.text: Sure you are.  And we're not help- ing her any, feeding her lies and more lies.  Getting herself ready for a pioture ...  What happens when she finds out?

turns.speaker: MAX
turns.text: She never will.  That is my job. It has been for a long time.  You must understand I discovered her when she was eighteen.  I made her a star.  I cannot let her be destroyed.

turns.speaker: GILLIS
turns.text: You made her a star?

turns.speaker: MAX
turns.text: I directed all her early pictures. There were three young directors who showed promise in those days: D.W. Grirrith, C.B. deMille, and Max von Mayerling.

turns.speaker: GILLIS
turns.text: And she's turned you into a servant.

turns.speaker: MAX
turns.text: It was I who asked to come back, humiliating as it may seem.  I could have gone on witn my career, only I found everything unendur- able arter she divorced me.  You see, I was her rirst husband.

turns.speaker: NO. 1
turns.text: Joseph C. Gillis?

turns.speaker: GILLIS
turns.text: That's right.

turns.speaker: NO. 1
turns.text: We've come for the car.

turns.speaker: GILLIS
turns.text: What car?

turns.speaker: GILLIS
turns.text: Relax, fans.  The car isn't here.

turns.speaker: NO. 1
turns.text: Is that So?

turns.speaker: GILLIS
turns.text: I lent it to a friend of mine. He took it up to Palm Springs.

turns.speaker: NO. 1
turns.text: Had to get away for his health, I suppose.

turns.speaker: GILLIS
turns.text: You don't believe me?  Look in the garage.

turns.speaker: NO. 1
turns.text: Sure we believe you, only now we want you to believe us.  That car better be back here by noon tomorrow, or there's going to be fireworks.

turns.speaker: GILLIS
turns.text: You say the cutest things.

turns.speaker: SHELDRAKE
turns.text: All right, Gillis.  You've got five minutes.  What's your story about?

turns.speaker: GILLIS
turns.text: It's about a ball player, a rookie shortstop that's batting 347.  The poor kid was once mixed up in a hold- up.  But he's trying to go straight -- except there's a bunch of gamblers who won't let him.

turns.speaker: SHELDRAKE
turns.text: So they tell the kid to throw the World Series, or else, huh?

turns.speaker: GILLIS
turns.text: More or less.  Only for the end I've got a gimmick that's real good.

turns.speaker: SHELDRAKE
turns.text: Got a title?

turns.speaker: GILLIS
turns.text: Bases Loaded.  There's a 4O-page outline.

turns.speaker: SHELDRAKE
turns.text: Get the Readers' Department and see what they have on Bases Loaded.

turns.speaker: GILLIS
turns.text: Oh, you're one of the message kids.  Just a story won't do. You'd have turned down Gone With the Wind.

turns.speaker: SHELDRAKE
turns.text: No, that was me.  I said, Who wants to see a Civil War picture?

turns.speaker: SHELDRAKE
turns.text: Well, seems like Zanuck's got himself a baseball picture.

turns.speaker: GILLIS
turns.text: Mr. Sheldrake, I don't want you to think I thought this was going to win any Academy Award.

turns.speaker: SHELDRAKE
turns.text: Of course, we're always looking for a Betty Hutton.  Do you see it as a Betty Hutton?

turns.speaker: GILLIS
turns.text: Frankly, no.

turns.speaker: SHELDRAKE
turns.text: Now wait a minute.  If we made it a girls' softball team, put in a few numbers.  Might make a cute musical: It Happened in the Bull Pen -- the story of a Woman.

turns.speaker: GILLIS
turns.text: You trying to be funny?  -- because I'm all out of laughs.  I'm over a barrel and I need a job.

turns.speaker: SHELDRAKE
turns.text: Sure, Gillis.  If something should come along -

turns.speaker: GILLIS
turns.text: Along is no good.  I need it now.

turns.speaker: SHELDRAKE
turns.text: Haven't got a thing.

turns.speaker: GILLIS
turns.text: Any kind of assignment.  Additional Dialogue.

turns.speaker: SHELDRAKE
turns.text: There's nothing, Gillis.  Not even if you were a relative.

turns.speaker: GILLIS
turns.text: Look, Mr. Sheldrake, could you let me have three hundred bucks yourself, as a personal loan?

turns.speaker: SHELDRAKE
turns.text: Could I?  Gillis, last year some- body talked me into buying a ranch in the valley.  So I borrowed money from the bank so I could pay for the ranch.  This year I had to mortgage the ranch so I could keep up my life insurance so I could borrow on the insurance so I could pay my income tax.  Now if Dewey had been elected -

turns.speaker: GILLIS
turns.text: Goodbye, Mr. Sheldrake.

turns.speaker: MORINO
turns.text: So you need three hundred dollars? Of course, I could give you three hundred dollars.  Only I'm not going to.

turns.speaker: GILLIS
turns.text: No?

turns.speaker: MORINO
turns.text: Gillis, get this through your head.  I'm not just your agent. It's not the ten per cent.  I'm your friend.

turns.speaker: GILLIS
turns.text: How's that about your being my friend?

turns.speaker: MORINO
turns.text: Don't you know the finest things in the world have been written on an empty stomach?  Once a talent like yours gets into that Mocambo- Romanoff rut, you're through.

turns.speaker: GILLIS
turns.text: Forget Romanoff's.  It's the car I'm talking about.  If I lose my car it's like having my legs out off.

turns.speaker: MORINO
turns.text: Greatest thing that could happen to you.  Now you'll have to sit behind that typewriter.  Now you'll have to write.

turns.speaker: GILLIS
turns.text: What do you think I've been doing? I need three hundred dollars.

turns.speaker: MORINO
turns.text: Maybe what you need is another agent.

turns.speaker: HOLMBY HILLS CAPTAIN
turns.text: You do not deny having killed this man, Miss Desmond?

turns.speaker: HEAD OF HOMICIDE
turns.text: Did you intend to kill him? Just answer me that.

turns.speaker: HOLMBY HILLS CAPTAIN
turns.text: Was it a sudden quarrel?  Had there been any trouble between you before?

turns.speaker: HEAD OF HOMICIDE
turns.text: If it was a quarrel, how come you had the gun right there?

turns.speaker: HOLMBY HILLS CAPTAIN
turns.text: This guy -- where did you meet him for the first time?  Where did he come from? Who is he?

turns.speaker: HEAD OF HOMICIDE
turns.text: Did he have a wife?  Did he had a girl friend?  Did you know them?

turns.speaker: HOLMBY HILLS CAPTAIN
turns.text: Had he been trying to blackmail you?

turns.speaker: HEAD OF HOMICIDE
turns.text: Did the deceased ever threaten you? Were you in fear of bodily injury?

turns.speaker: HOLMBY HILLS CAPTAIN
turns.text: Did you hate him?  Had you ever thought of doing something like this before?

turns.speaker: HEAD OF HOMICIDE
turns.text: Was theft involved?  Did you catch him trying to steal something, or find he had stolen something?

turns.speaker: HOLMBY HILLS CAPTAIN
turns.text: Well, it's one way to get her down stairs.

turns.speaker: HEAD OF HOMICIDE
turns.text: Okay.  And let's have the car right outside.

turns.speaker: NORMA
turns.text: Bring something to drink.

turns.speaker: MAX
turns.text: Yes.  Madame.

turns.speaker: NORMA
turns.text: Wait a minute.  I want you to get out the car.  You're going to take the script over to Paramount and deliver it to Mr. De Mille in person.

turns.speaker: MAX
turns.text: Yes, Madame.

turns.speaker: MAX
turns.text: Madame is wanted on the telephone.

turns.speaker: NORMA
turns.text: You know better than to interrupt me.

turns.speaker: MAX
turns.text: Paramount is calling.

turns.speaker: NORMA
turns.text: Who?

turns.speaker: MAX
turns.text: Paramount studios.

turns.speaker: NORMA
turns.text: Now, now do you belive me? I told you deMille would jump at it.

turns.speaker: MAX
turns.text: It is not Mr. deMille in person. It is someone by the name or Gordon Cole.  He says it's very important.

turns.speaker: NORMA
turns.text: Certainly it's important.  It's important enough for Mr. deMille to call me personally.  The idea of having an assistant call me!

turns.speaker: MAX
turns.text: I myself was surprised at Mr. de Mille's manners.

turns.speaker: NORMA
turns.text: Say that I'm busy, and hang up.

turns.speaker: MAX
turns.text: Very good, Madam.

turns.speaker: MAX
turns.text: If you will pardon me, Madame. The shadow over the left eye is not quite balanced.

turns.speaker: NORMA
turns.text: Thank you, Max.

turns.speaker: NORMA
turns.text: Cameras? ...What is it, Max?

turns.speaker: MAX
turns.text: The cameras have arrived, Madame.

turns.speaker: NORMA
turns.text: They have?  Thank you, Max.  Tell Mr. DeMille I will be on the set at once.

turns.speaker: NORMA
turns.text: What is the scene? Where am I?

turns.speaker: MAX
turns.text: This is the staircase of the palace.

turns.speaker: NORMA
turns.text: Oh, yes, yes.  They're below, waiting for the Princess ... I'm ready.

turns.speaker: MAX
turns.text: All right.  Camera!  Action!

turns.speaker: ZALTAR
turns.text: You and your husband have been kind to me, Alura. I have something to tell you: I'm going away. Soon.

turns.speaker: ALURA
turns.text: But where?

turns.speaker: ZALTAR
turns.text: I've discovered a new way into the Phantom Zone.

turns.speaker: ALURA
turns.text: But the phantom Zone is for criminals.

turns.speaker: ZALTAR
turns.text: It's big. And empty. I'm tired of limiting myself to  Argo City. I want to do something new. I'm starting to repeat myself here with this airy, glittery stuff....

turns.speaker: ZALTAR
turns.text: I'm an artist, Alura. My work comes first. Other people come second.

turns.speaker: ALURA
turns.text: How can you create beauty...with a selfish heart? The spiky insect-creature flies closer and closer around the little girl's head, buzzing angrily. Her look of delight turns to fear. She tries to shoo the creature away. It flies off toward the thin membrane that encloses the city.

turns.speaker: ALURA
turns.text: But the Power Source, Zaltar.

turns.speaker: ZALTAR
turns.text: It couldn't be helped. The city will have to make do with three.

turns.speaker: ALURA
turns.text: But what will happen?

turns.speaker: ZALTAR
turns.text: The Guardians will be angry. They may even send me to the Phantom Zone. You see, I didn't really have permission to borrow it. I must go explain to them...

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: I said stop, I didn't say run into a brick wall.

turns.speaker: BIANCA
turns.text: What is it?

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: The Coffer of Shadow. Look at it.

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: What does it mean?

turns.speaker: BIANCA
turns.text: The danger. The one Nigel spoke of. It must be near .

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: Oh, fiddlesticks. What could be dangerous about a baseball game?

turns.speaker: BIANCA
turns.text: Softball.

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: It must be the girls. One of the girls.

turns.speaker: BIANCA
turns.text: But which one?

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: Drive on. We have already attracted enough attention.

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: We'll bide our time and keep watch. Young girls just can't keep a secret. If one of them's up to something--we'll find out.

turns.speaker: BIANCA
turns.text: And then, like great cats---we pounce! And destroy!

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: Bianca, try not to be so bloodthirsty when you're at the wheel. OK?

turns.speaker: BIANCA
turns.text: Sorry, mistress.

turns.speaker: BIANCA
turns.text: Is he your entertainment for tonight?

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: He will be. In about five minutes.

turns.speaker: BIANCA
turns.text: Have fun.

turns.speaker: BIANCA
turns.text: I came as quickly as I could. What is the danger?

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: It's what we were warned about.

turns.speaker: BIANCA
turns.text: A Storm Dragon?

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: No, a super girl.

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: Why did she have to show up now?

turns.speaker: BIANCA
turns.text: Eliminate her.

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: That's easy for you to say, Bianca.

turns.speaker: BIANCA
turns.text: You can do it. You're the most powerful woman on Earth.

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: Am I? Still?

turns.speaker: BIANCA
turns.text: Yes! You own the Coffer of Shadow. Nothing can withstand its power.

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: I've been saving it. For the right moment.

turns.speaker: BIANCA
turns.text: That moment is now! What good is a sword unless it be unsheathed? Use it, and no one will dare oppose you again. No one.

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: What do I do?  I don't know her name.

turns.speaker: BIANCA
turns.text: The Naming of Names is not necessary. Just concentrate on her face. Your Shadow will do the rest.

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: Next time, remind me to do this out in the yard.

turns.speaker: BIANCA
turns.text: Yes, of course, it was foolish of me.

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: I think I'd better keep it.

turns.speaker: BIANCA
turns.text: Whatever you say.

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: Yes. Whatever I say.  From now on.

turns.speaker: BIANCA
turns.text: Home?

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: No way. I'm not going to let that little hussy make a monkey out of me.

turns.speaker: BIANCA
turns.text: Is it her that's bothering you--or your gardener?

turns.speaker: BIANCA
turns.text: Sure glad you didn't let make a monkey of you.

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: Shut up, and get me a hacksaw.

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: I don't feel like it right now.

turns.speaker: BIANCA
turns.text: She didn't take it from you, did she?

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: That little girl? Ha.  Now go on, get me some tools.

turns.speaker: BIANCA
turns.text: There's no need. I learned the Craft from my 						grandmother.

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: At last. Ultimate Power.

turns.speaker: BIANCA
turns.text: And the first thing we do is get rid of Supergirl!

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: What do you mean we?

turns.speaker: ELDERLY MAN
turns.text: I don't want much, Selena. I have simple tastes.

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: What do you want?

turns.speaker: ELDERLY MAN
turns.text: Western Europe.

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: I'm sorry, but I already promised Bianca she could have Switzerland. You know how she loves to ski.

turns.speaker: ELDERLY MAN
turns.text: No problem. She can have it. I hate mountains.

turns.speaker: ELDERLY MAN
turns.text: Is this Nigel's doing?

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: It's a warning, that's for sure.

turns.speaker: ELDERLY MAN
turns.text: Maybe it was just an accident.

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: There's no such thing as an accident. Everything has meaning, if you can read the signs.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: Wait...don't leave me in here...

turns.speaker: SUPERGIRL
turns.text: It's for your own protection.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: What's happening?

turns.speaker: SUPERGIRL
turns.text: I'm taking you to the hospital.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: Let me out. I have to talk to you.

turns.speaker: SUPERGIRL
turns.text: Later.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: Don't leave me.

turns.speaker: SUPERGIRL
turns.text: I have to.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: When can I see, you again ?

turns.speaker: SUPERGIRL
turns.text: Relax. Tomorrow this will all seem like a bad dream. Goodbye.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: You're alive! She didn't kill you!

turns.speaker: SUPERGIRL
turns.text: Who didn't?

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: That woman who's after me. She hates you. Because she knows I love you.

turns.speaker: SUPERGIRL
turns.text: You love me?

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: My angel. My goddess. I feel I've always loved you all my life. I'll die if I can't spend the rest of my life just looking at you, holding you in my arms...

turns.speaker: SUPERGIRL
turns.text: We have to have a long talk about all this.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: I know just the place. Hang a left at the Amalgamated Tower.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: This is my favourite place in the city.

turns.speaker: SUPERGIRL
turns.text: Are you sure it's all right for us to be here?

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: They don't care, they're tearing it down for a shopping centre.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: Like it?

turns.speaker: SUPERGIRL
turns.text: Yes. It reminds me of home.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: Where Superman's from? Krypton?

turns.speaker: SUPERGIRL
turns.text: No. Argo City. It was on a chunk of rock that was part of Krypton once---but we moved it to inner space.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: I'm sorry, I don't understand.

turns.speaker: SUPERGIRL
turns.text: It's not important. The important thing is I'm here to find something and I think you can he1p me.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: Come on, let's ride.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: I used to work here summers when I was a kid.

turns.speaker: SUPERGIRL
turns.text: Ethan, tell me more about this woman who's after you.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: Let's talk about us, not her.

turns.speaker: SUPERGIRL
turns.text: Tell me where I can find her.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: I don't want you to go near her. She's bad news.

turns.speaker: SUPERGIRL
turns.text: But be reasonable. If I don't do something to stop her she'll try again. And maybe hurt you.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: I'll be safe with you. We can stay together the rest of our lives.

turns.speaker: SUPERGIRL
turns.text: We can't do that.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: Why not ?

turns.speaker: SUPERGIRL
turns.text: We're from different worlds.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: Just give me a chance to show how much I love you. Love changes everything. Love makes everything possib1e.

turns.speaker: SUPERGIRL
turns.text: All this talk about love, it's silly.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: You don't like me? You hate me?

turns.speaker: SUPERGIRL
turns.text: Of Course I don't hate you. I  don't hate anyone.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: What do you feel about me?

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: There's one sure way to find out how you feel.

turns.speaker: SUPERGIRL
turns.text: What's that?

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: Let me kiss you.

turns.speaker: SUPERGIRL
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: You're not afraid are you?

turns.speaker: SUPERGIRL
turns.text: Of course not, but...there are things we don't understand.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: If we wait until we understand everything we'll be dead. Come on. You can learn more from one kiss than from years in school.

turns.speaker: SUPERGIRL
turns.text: Well...I guess one is all right.

turns.speaker: SUPERGIRL
turns.text: Is this how?

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: Terrific.

turns.speaker: SUPERGIRL
turns.text: I thought I'd show you one of my favourite places.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: It's paradise . We could be very happy here.

turns.speaker: SUPERGIRL
turns.text: But I have to go back. I brought you here so you'd be safe. From her.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: You can't just abandon me.  Alone.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: Great! I'II build a house-- right over there, with a veranda looking out to sea. And I'll plant a garden! Papayas, pineapples, bananas, mangoes--- anything'll grow here. And I'II fish in the lagoon, and we can go sailing in a dugout canoe, and---

turns.speaker: SUPERGIRL
turns.text: Ethan---when I said 'a while' I meant a couple of hours.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: She said it wouldn't last.

turns.speaker: SUPERGIRL
turns.text: What wouldn't last? What's the matter with you?

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: I don't love you any more.

turns.speaker: SUPERGIRL
turns.text: Just like that?

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: Like turning off a light.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: Away. From you.

turns.speaker: SUPERGIRL
turns.text: But why?

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: Because you remind me of all the dumb things I said.

turns.speaker: SUPERGIRL
turns.text: I sort of like what you said.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: That makes it worse.

turns.speaker: SUPERGIRL
turns.text: But I don't understand.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: Hi.

turns.speaker: SUPERGIRL
turns.text: Hello. Are you still mad at me?

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: I'm not mad at you.

turns.speaker: SUPERGIRL
turns.text: It seemed that way to me.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: I know I was acting funny---I'm sorry. It's just...I miss it.

turns.speaker: SUPERGIRL
turns.text: Miss what?

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: What I had before. What's not there now. It's like I woke up and found part of me wasn't there any more: something that made me feel really alive and aware of things. It was like, for the first time in my life, everything fitted together perfectly---you and me and the world around us--like we were a wonderful song...

turns.speaker: SUPERGIRL
turns.text: And now?

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: And now...the guitars are out of tune, and the words don't make sense, and somebody unplugged the mike...

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: You think so?

turns.speaker: SUPERGIRL
turns.text: I don't see why not.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: But what if---it wasn't real?

turns.speaker: SUPERGIRL
turns.text: Feelings are real. Once you've had them, they're yours forever.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: Hey, listen, when all this blows over, maybe we could get together every now and then and see each other. And maybe something might. happen again. What do you think?

turns.speaker: SUPERGIRL
turns.text: Are you asking me for a "date"?

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: Why not? You're a good-looking girl. And I'm--- available.

turns.speaker: SUPERGIRL
turns.text: Aren't you forgetting about Selena?

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: She'll forget about us eventually.

turns.speaker: SUPERGIRL
turns.text: There's something very dangerous about her. Something evil...

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: I know what it is. She has this lead container shaped like a gargoyle. Inside there's a silvery ring...

turns.speaker: SUPERGIRL
turns.text: That's the Power Source that was lost from Argo City! That's what I came: to find! Where does she live?

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: In this big old house on Orchard Avenue---but you better stay away from there.

turns.speaker: SUPERGIRL
turns.text: I can see through walls. I could surprise her. The only thing I can't see through is lead, that's why I didn't see the Power Source at the amusement park.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: Wait. Don't leave me.

turns.speaker: SUPERGIRL
turns.text: You'll be safe here. I'll come back as soon as I have the Power Source.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: Before you go...

turns.speaker: SUPERGIRL
turns.text: What?

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: Just one kiss. For old times' sake.

turns.speaker: SUPERGIRL
turns.text: And you can see how you feel about me, right?

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: SUPERGIRL
turns.text: You've had your fun, Selena, the game is over.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: She has hostages.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: It's her shadow-self! Her dark side!

turns.speaker: SUPERGIRL
turns.text: How do I fight it?

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: Turn it against her.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: No thanks. I have friends in the resistance. They'll vouch for me. I figure I might get a million bucks for my memoirs.

turns.speaker: SUPERGIRL
turns.text: I'll come back as soon as I can.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: She's right. They'll string her up.

turns.speaker: SUPERGIRL
turns.text: Do you want to come to Argo City?

turns.speaker: LUCY
turns.text: Hey! Ethan!

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: Hmmm?

turns.speaker: LUCY
turns.text: Remember me? We were in a disaster together.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: A little.

turns.speaker: LUCY
turns.text: Can you get us out? It's all a misunderstanding. We thought they were selling hamburgers in that place.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: I'll mention it upstairs.

turns.speaker: LUCY
turns.text: Hey, I thought you were gonna mention us upstairs.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: I did.

turns.speaker: LUCY
turns.text: Well thanks a pile, fella.

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: Finished your estimate?

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: Well, there's several ways to go .

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: Come in, have a drink, we'll talk.

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: You must be very popular in the neighborhood. I always see your truck parked around.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: I have a lot of repeat business. People seem to like my service.

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: I bet they do.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: What's that big black scar on the ground? Like a fire.

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: Oh, you know how parties are. Always some damage.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: What is it?

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: A passionfruit smoothee.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: Well, just one.

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: To us. And to the seeds we'll plant together.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: I'll drink to that.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: Oh no, not you again.

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: What an adorable hat.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: They think I have a concussion.

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: And you think you're in love.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: I know it.

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: This "love" of yours will soon wear off. I gave you a temporary love potion.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: Why should I believe you?

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: It's the truth. In twenty-four hours you'll forget all about that girl.

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: Yes, yes I saw the whole thing. How could you be interested in that puny little girl?

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: But she is real, it wasn't just a concussion.

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: Forget her, you're mine. I saw you first.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: Nurse! Nurse!

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: You can't escape from me that easily. I'm afraid you don't know who I am.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: Nurse!

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: Don't think I'm weak, just because I'm a woman. I have Power. Give in, stop fighting me, Ethan. I always get what I want.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: Nurse! Help !

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: This is your problem, right here. This girl's driving you insane, Ethan. Let me help you.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: I don't want your help.

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: Come back to my house. My car's outside.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: No!

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: I never met a man I couldn't have--and you're no different from the rest!

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: I'm wise to your tricks, lady.

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: I could force you.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: If that worked, you would've done it already. No, you want me to drink it of my own free will. Well let me tell you, sweetheart, it'll be a cold day in hell before I fall for that one again.

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: Go on,  talk big! I'll soon have you purring like a kitten.

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: You've been without water for a whole day. Let's see how thirsty you get in a week.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: You vicious--

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: Careful, don't make me angry. I start fires when I'm angry.

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: They want me. Doesn't it make you proud?

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: Yeah.

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: Guess! Go on.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: I don't know. You seem afraid.

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: You're a regular Einstein, aren't you?

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: Supergirl?

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: You can't put her out of your mind, is that it?

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: Well...I guess I can't.

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: I'm ready for her. I'll show you.

turns.speaker: ETHAN
turns.text: Why the empty cage?

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: That one was for you. But I thought I'd wait and see how you behave when Supergirl gets here. I'd hate to lose you, Ethan.

turns.speaker: GEORGE
turns.text: You sure are a good cook, Selena. Man, that looks too pretty to eat.

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: Better eat it quick. It won't look too pretty when it's all covered with ants.

turns.speaker: GEORGE
turns.text: Selena, I've been thinking. It's time I settled down---and I don't know a nicer lady to settle down with than you.

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: Why George, are you proposing?

turns.speaker: GEORGE
turns.text: Marry me, Selena. The hardware store doesn't bring in much now, but...

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: George---I thought you'd never ask.

turns.speaker: GEORGE
turns.text: Hey, where you going?

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: I've got things to do.

turns.speaker: GEORGE
turns.text: What about my proposal?

turns.speaker: SELENA
turns.text: Call me next week. Maybe we can have lunch.

turns.speaker: JIMMY
turns.text: Nice to meet you. Lucy's told me all about you. Your cousin Clark taught me everything I know about the newspaper business.

turns.speaker: LINDA
turns.text: Nice to meet you.
